summary.para: Static class containing extension methods for implementors of the generic IEnumerable such as List or Array.

member.name: M:ArrowUtilities.Mathematics.EnumerableHelpers.GetAlphabet

summary.para: Shortcut for adding all 26 letters of the alphabet to an array. (Utilized in RNG.Letter)

member.returns: Char[] with all 26 letters of the alphabet.

member.name: M:ArrowUtilities.Mathematics.EnumerableHelpers.GetDigits

summary.para: Shortcut for adding all 10 digits to an array. (Utilized in RNG.Digit)

member.returns: Char[] with all 10 numeric digits.

member.name: M:ArrowUtilities.Mathematics.EnumerableHelpers.GetAlphanumerics

summary.para: Shortcut for adding all 36 alphanumeric characters to an array.

member.returns: Char[] with all 36 alphanumeric characters.

member.name: M:ArrowUtilities.Mathematics.EnumerableHelpers.GetPreFilledArray``1(System.Int32,``0)

summary.para: Generic function for initializing an array with the contents filled with a single value.

member.param: Number of entries on resulting array.
Object or value to fill every entry with.
member.typeparam: Type of value or reference being stored.
member.returns: Array with the same entry at every index.

member.name: M:ArrowUtilities.Mathematics.EnumerableHelpers.Randomize``1(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{``0})

summary.para:
Generic helper function for implementors of generic IEnumerable that takes in an IEnumerable, and outputs a randomized version
WARNING: This duplicates the enumerable! Avoid using in loops or performance-critical contexts.

member.returns: A new IEnumerable with randomized entries.

member.name: M:ArrowUtilities.Mathematics.EnumerableHelpers.GetRandomEntry``1(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{``0})

summary.para: Generic helper function for IEnumerable that takes in a collection, and outputs a random entry.

member.param: The collection to randomly draw from.
member.returns: A random entry from the collection.

summary.para: Tools to assist with randomized mechanics

member.name: M:ArrowUtilities.Mathematics.RNG.Chance(System.Single)

summary.para: A basic random boolean generator with customized win percentage

member.returns: True if the result is within the set percentage

member.name: M:ArrowUtilities.Mathematics.RNG.FiftyFifty

summary.para: Boolean generator based on a random value compared against 0.5f

member.returns: True if the value is within the 0.5f tolerance

summary.para:
Returns an integer between 1 and the number of sides provided.
Note: values less than '1' will always return '-1.'

member.name: M:ArrowUtilities.Mathematics.RNG.CoinFlipInt

summary.para: Flips a coin

member.returns: Integer result of the toss (0 or 1)

member.name: M:ArrowUtilities.Mathematics.RNG.CoinFlip

summary.para: Flips a coin

member.returns: String result of the toss (Heads or Tails)

summary.para: Rolls a 4-sided die

summary.para: Rolls a 6-sided die

summary.para: Rolls a 10-sided die

member.name: M:ArrowUtilities.Mathematics.RNG.UnityColor

summary.para: Gets a random color from the Unity color presets.

member.returns: Black, Blue, Cyan, Gray, Green, Magenta, Red, White, or Yellow

member.name: M:ArrowUtilities.Mathematics.RNG.Color

summary.para:
Gets a random color using randomized R, G, and B values.
Note: Use RNG.UnityColor to get only the preset color options.

member.returns:
Randomized color.
(Alpha is always set to 1.)

member.name: M:ArrowUtilities.Mathematics.RNG.Letter

summary.para: Randomly retrieves a letter from A to Z.

member.returns: Any letter from A to Z.

member.name: M:ArrowUtilities.Mathematics.RNG.Digit

summary.para: Randomly retrieves a digit from 0 to 9.

member.returns: Any digit from 0 to 9 as a Char.

member.name: M:ArrowUtilities.Mathematics.RNG.Alphanumeric
member.summary: Randomly retrieves a letter or digit from A to Z or 0 to 9 respectively.
member.returns: Any alphanumeric from A to Z or 0 to 9.

member.name: M:ArrowUtilities.Mathematics.RNG.GetReferenceToRandom

summary.para: Gets or creates a static instance of System.Random through null-coalescing assignment.

member.returns: Static instance of System.Random()

summary.para: Static class containing serializable versions of the UnityEngine 'Vector' family of structs.

member.name: M:ArrowUtilities.Serialization.SerializableVectorHelpers.ToSerializable(UnityEngine.Vector2)

summary.para:
Method for easily prepping Vector2 structs for JSON serialization.
Note: The same can be done in reverse with ".ToVector2()"

member.returns: The same vector in a form that is more easily converted by serialization methods.

summary.para:
Method for easily prepping Vector2Int structs for JSON serialization.
Note: The same can be done in reverse with ".ToVector2Int()"

member.returns: The same vector in a form that is more easily converted by serialization methods.

summary.para: Static class containing methods designed to set many tiles at runtime in a performant way.

member.name: M:ArrowUtilities.TilemapTools.TileHelperFunctions.SetSquareOfTiles(UnityEngine.Tilemaps.Tilemap,UnityEngine.Vector3Int,System.Int32,UnityEngine.Tilemaps.Tile)

summary.para:
Helper method for setting a square of tiles all at once.
Note: This statically caches the values for size and tile, so continuous usage (with the same parameters) remains performant.

member.param: The Tilemap asset to set to.
The bottom, leftmost corner of the shape.
The number of tiles per side.

member.name: M:ArrowUtilities.TilemapTools.TileHelperFunctions.SetRectangleOfTiles(UnityEngine.Tilemaps.Tilemap,UnityEngine.Vector3Int,System.Int32,System.Int32,UnityEngine.Tilemaps.Tile)

summary.para:
Helper method for setting a rectangle of tiles all at once.
Note: This statically caches the values for size and tile, so continuous usage (with the same parameters) remains performant.

member.param: The Tilemap asset to set to.
The bottom, leftmost corner of the shape
The number of tiles on the y axis
The number of tiles on the x axis

summary.para:
Nullifies the cached data for the SetSquareOfTiles and SetRectangleOfTiles methods.
Use this when either method is no longer being utilized in the scene, and likely will not be used again.
